TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateGroupCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateGroupCollection Implements IList
public ref class TemplateGroupCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type TemplateGroupCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示控件设计器中 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和任何派生类都将 属性定义为 对象。The class, and any derived class, defines the property as a object. 属性通常仅由设计宿主（如）使用 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 。The property is typically used only by a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 添加对象时，集合的大小动态增加。The collection dynamically increases in size as objects are added. 此集合中的索引从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用 属性来确定集合中有多少个组。Use the property to determine how many groups are in the collection. 此外，使用 方法和属性提供以下功能：Additionally, use the methods and properties to provide the following functionality: - 用于将单个组添加到集合中的方法。The method to add a single group to the collection. - 用于将组添加到集合中特定索引处的方法。The method to add a group at a particular index within the collection. - 用于移除组的方法。The method to remove a group. - 用于移除特定索引处的组的方法。The method to remove the group at a particular index. - 用于确定特定组是否已存在于集合中的方法。The method to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection. - 用于检索集合中组的索引的方法。The method to retrieve the index of a group within the collection. - 用于获取或设置特定索引处的组的索引器，使用数组表示法。The indexer to get or set the group at a particular index, using array notation. - 向 集合中添加多个组的方法。The method to add multiple groups to the collection. 可以将多个组添加为组的数组，或添加为 通过 其他控件设计器的属性检索的对象。You can add multiple groups either as an array of groups or as a object that you retrieve through the property of another control designer. - 要从集合中移除所有组的方法。The method to remove all groups from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义派生自类的简单控件设计器 。The following code example demonstrates how to define a simple control designer that is derived from the class. 派生的控件设计器 通过获取为基类定义的模板组并添加特定于派生控件设计器的模板组来实现属性。The derived control designer implements the property by getting the template groups that are defined for the base class and adding a template group that is specific to the derived control designer. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection/CS/templategroupcollectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection/VB/templategroupcollectionsample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过对对象使用方法来确定相等性 。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间与属性成正比 。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板组集合通常很小，所以线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template group collections typically are small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

summary.span: 获取集合中 对象的数量。

span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.

value.span: 集合中 对象的数目。

span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性通常用于在循环访问集合中的对象时确定上限索引。The property generally is used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 由于集合索引是从零开始的，因此第一个元素位于索引处， `0` 最后一个元素位于索引处 `Count-1` 。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 索引器检索集合中指定的组， `index` 或设置集合中指定的组 `index` 。Use the indexer to retrieve the group at a specified `index` within the collection or to set the group at a specified `index` within the collection. 可以通过使用数组表示法来索引集合中的元素。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，你可以 `i` 使用 `TemplateGroups(i)` Microsoft 标志或 c # 的表示法在 index 处为元素编制索引 `TemplateGroups[i]` 。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `TemplateGroups(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `TemplateGroups[i]` for C#. 如果具有对组对象的引用并需要集合中对象的索引，请使用 方法。When you have a reference to the group object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup group) cil managed

param.name: group
param.span: 要从该集合中移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从集合中移除的第一个匹配项 `group` 。The method removes the first occurrence of `group` from the collection. 如果 对象不包含 `group` ，则集合保持不变。If the object does not contain `group`, the collection remains unchanged. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. 方法通过对对象使用方法来确定相等性 。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间与属性成正比 。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板组集合通常很小，所以线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template group collections typically are small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical. 若要从集合中移除特定索引处的组，请使用 方法。To remove a group at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要从集合中移除所有组，请使用 方法。To remove all the groups from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 从集合中移除项时，集合中的后续项的索引会发生更改。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
